reviewText: The dvd came quickly. The grandchildren love it.
Great!

This DVD contains 5 episodes from the Wordworld cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Happy Birthday, Dog
2. Pig's Present
3. The Rainbow Birthday Cake
4. Bit by Bit
5. Bugs to the Rescue!
I have ordered several World Word DVD's and have been so pleased!  Was so sad when I can no longer find them on PBS.  My preschool class loves these videos.
met expectations
Awesome and it came fast
Top notch educational and fun, even for adults to watch!

The characters are lively and cheerful. The story is easy to follow and good for kids. Above all, I highly appreciate that it has English subtitles!! As a non-native speaker, without English subtitles, it's sometimes hard to follow the story. I'm thinking of getting another series of this.
A great gift for a toddler. I have bought several copies to give away. Love the educational aspect!
My kids love it
Ordered this for my non verbal autistic son for his bday. He loves it, but I think it was a bigger hit with his little sister she was hooked. Cute little movie will definitely be getting more.
Both my son and my grandson love Word World so a Birthday one was fun.
My son loves this show
We love word world! Definitely helps the Littles see letters and learn while being entertained!
Watching every day
After watching it one time my grandson already knows what things are in the movie
My son loves this DVD
Absolutely love
My 2yr. old grandson  loves these.  He sings along and spells.
My son love it.
grandson loves it

I saw a recommendation for Word World on a review from another parent on another N Circle children's dvd. So I decided to get a Word Wirld dvd for my 1.5 year old. He loves it and I feel like he may even be learning from the dvd. 4 episodes on the dvd. About an hour long dvd or close. Very entertaining and educational.  Only 1 episode is related to birthdays while the rest are normal episodes.
we love word world! so fun and easy to follow for toddlers
